name: 李明哲
objective:
此門課程的主要目標，將以介紹高等積體電路設計為主，讓學生了解高等積體電路設計的理論、概念、流程及方法。課程將理論與實際並重，讓學生具有實際的高等積體電路設計能力。
1. Introduction 
2. Advanced VLSI System and Architecture Design 
3. Advanced VLSI Design Technique and Concept
4. Still Image/Video Compression VLSI Design
5. Digital Television VLSI Design
6. Digital Camera VLSI Design
7. Digital Watermarking VLSI Design
schedule:
week  1   Introduction
week  2   Process
week  3   Device
week  4   Inverter
week  5   National holiday
week  6   Transient responses
week  7   Combinational Circuits
week  8   NTUT anniversary
week  9   Mid-term project report
week 10   Sequential Circuits
week 11   Dynamic logic
week 12   Memory
week 13   Low-power techniques
week 14   Data converters
week 15   Arithmetic circuits
week 16   Final project report
scorePolicy:
Attendance: 20%
In-class participation: 20%
Mid-term project: 30%
Final project: 30%
materials:
(1) Sung-Mo. Kang and Yusuf Leblebici, “CMOS Integrated Circuits – Analysis and Design”, McGraw-Hill
(2) Jan M. Rabaey, “Digital Integrated Circuits”, Prentice Hall
